Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oIn a previous version of thepaper, the authors gave a proof that regular graphs are antimagic. However, in the proof of Claim 6, case 2 assumes that f(e)>\u2113 for every e\u2208 E(v_i-1)-E'_i. This assumption does not hold for
edges in E^\u03c3_i, thus the subsequent calculations are incorrect. The aim of the present erratum is to fix the proof\u00a7r
